tasks.description: Implement tests for the GameApp class game reset after game over
tasks.instructions: Implement tests to verify that the `GameApp` class resets the game correctly after a game over, including resetting the score and returning the snake to its initial length and position.

needed.GameApp.end_game(): Handles the end of the game and resets the game state.

needed.GameApp.score: The current score of the game.

needed.Snake.segments: The list of segments that make up the snake's body.
